entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ComInterfaceGenerator generates code that doesn't compile for [Out] blittable arrays #88708
    8.0.0
  • VectorDot test failes in codegen #88704
  • Fix RS1038 related warnings found in Interop source generators #88701
    9.0.0
  • Console.ReadKey throws an InvalidOperationException when other console-attached process dies #88697
  • [WASM] Enable new IL trim feature for WASM apps #88696
    8.0.0
  • [interp] inlining a wrapper with a MINT_LDSTR_TOKEN instruction aborts #88694
  • [API Proposal]: Add variation of TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones() not sorted on DisplayName #88691
    Future
  • Variant static interface dispatch behaves incorrectly on Native AOT #88690
  • Variant static interface dispatch behaves incorrectly on Mono #88689
  • Simplify CMake build system now that our minimum is 3.20 #88688
    Future
  • `DynamicallyAccessedMembersAnalyzer` throws for `InlineArrayAccessOperation` #88684
  • Re-enable the subscription from dotnet/sdk --> dotnet/runtime when using a Preview 7 SDK in runtime #88675
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33127: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #88674
  • [wasm-mt] `Wasm.Browser.Threads.Minimal.Sample` failing on `main` #88668
    8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deadlock on GCCollect #88663
    8.0.0
  • Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable() has wrong results for nested variables #88662
  • FileWatcher gets garbage-collected while it is being used #88659
  • AddSystemd should only check for NOTIFY_SOCKET env #88660
  • Regressions in System.Text.Perf_Ascii #88670
  • Regressions in System.Net.Primitives.Tests.IPAddressPerformanceTests #88671
  • Regressions in Devirtualization.EqualityComparer #88667
  • Regressions in System.Formats.Tar.Tests.Perf_TarFile #88672
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 7/7/2023 5:58:29 PM #88673
  • Enable ILLinker tests for externally-specified substitions #88647
    Future
  • Clickonce - conditionally updating update location #88643
  • Json source generator does not produce a valid diagnostic for JsonConverterAttribute subtype with no constructor parameters #88638
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Inconsistent Result | [.Net Framework vs .Net Core] | Comparer<DateTime>.Default.Compare(DateTime.UtcNow, DateTime.UtcNow) #88654
  • Variant static interface dispatch crashes the runtime #78621
    8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 should publish with NativeAOT at the beginning of the build #71557
    Future
  • Test failure System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector512Tests.Vector512IsHardwareAcceleratedTest #88580
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/CpuId_R2R_Avx/CpuId_R2R_Avx.sh #88582
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/X86Base/CpuId_r/X86_CpuId_r.dll #88581
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerTests.AssignmentTests.InspectVariableBeforeAndAfterAssignment` failing #64188
    8.0.0
  • wasm System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ToString() returns different string for some types in public field compare to desktop #88637
  • Generate error message when createdump is missing or does not have executable permissions #87352
    8.0.0
  • Missing API: Guid.TryWriteBytes(..., out int bytesWritten) #30940
    Future
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #86798
    8.0.0
  • MissingMethodException in use of System.Text.Json since 8.0.0-preview.6.23329.7 #88681
  • [coreclr] calling a constructor via an UnmanagedCallersOnly UnsafeAccessor crashes #88629
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 20 Regressions on 6/30/2023 4:39:46 PM #88375
    8.0.0
  • The mono_marshal_ilgen_init symbol is private in libmonosgen-2.0.dylib #74628
    8.0.0
  • July 2023 Infra Rollout: Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #88164
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33170: .NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #88677
  • PublishAot affects non-AOT behavior #81803
  • behavior of [:XX:] inside a regex range has changed #88587
  • Crash caused by DateTime.TryParse MacCatalyst signed Release only #85414
    8.0.0
  • [browser][globalization][tests] RegionInfoPropertyTests.DisplayName failures #45951
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] [Android] CI failure: Interop_DllImportSearchPaths - Non-success instrumentation exit code: 101, expected: 100 #86271
  • ILC fails to initialize native object writer with path containing '../' #87961
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Blazor project failing to publish on windows due to a unicode character in the path #87877
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT CLI Experience Improvements in .NET 8 #79570
    8.0.0
  • Handle failures from printf when tracing errors #3760
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `JsonConverterAttribute<T>` #87047
    Future
  • Consider getting rid of DumpNativeResources task #79634
    Future
  • Marshal does not blit structure-typed return values from calls to WASM native dependencies #63879
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] wasm-experimental: dotnet publish with output directory doesn't put the AppBundle in the output directory #83760
  • ilcompiler: System.Diagnostics.Debugger.IsSupported has already been added #86186
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf run failure for AOT : `wasm-validator error in function System_Threading_Channels_System_Collections_Generic_Deque_1_T_GSHAREDVT_get_IsEmpty] unexpected false: local.get index must be small enough` #86471
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm][AOT] methods performing stack crawling fail under profiled AOT #47996
    8.0.0
  • WebAssembly Encoding.UTF8.GetString extremely slow on cyrillic characters #54493
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf benchmark failures - `System.Text.Json` serializer related failures #88610
    8.0.0
  • [mono][dbg] EvaluateConstantValueUsingRuntimeEvaluate test crash on Chrome #87053
  • [API Proposal]: Add an overload of the StackTrace constructor to take in an array of frames #82871
    Future
  • Blazor webassembly loading error: CompileError: WebAssembly.instantiate(): expected magic word 00 61 73 6d, found 3c 21 44 4f @+0 #77842
  • [Mono WASM] CoreCLR tests on WASM: tests depending on thread support failed #41472
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify KeyAnalyzer #88709
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Enable the option to invoke APICompat in strict mode for ref-pack servicing #88707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • HttpClientFactory logging configuration #88706
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Switch the order of AOT SDK and framework assemblies #88703
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] [testing] Allocate a bunch of memory before exiting #88702
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable new analyzers CA1862, CA1864 in runtime and fix findings. #88700
    area-Meta
  • Total time in GC counter #88699
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Bumping .net7 and .net6 version #88698
    needs-area-label
  • [WIP] Improve `File.Copy` by using the block copy operation for ReFS on Windows #88695
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix SuperFileCheck from failing outerloop #88692
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Try using from-source-emsdk build for runtime #88687
    needs-area-label
  • Update toolset compiler #88686
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix reading metadata info after applying changes #88685
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove `DelegateInvokeStubManager` #88683
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #88682
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #88680
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Don't generate Unmanaged-to-Managed stubs with diagnostics #88679
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Clean up usings in test cases assembly #88678
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • [browser][mt] smoke test active issues #88676
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Mark replacements as dirty after setting GTF_VAR_DEATH #88669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Always consider empty remainders to be dying in physical promotion #88665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #88664
    area-Host
  • [RISC-V] Missing defines in GC #88661
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix GetArgLoc #88657
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • OpenSSL ENGINE support #88656
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][tests] Add support for mobile devices in processinfo3 test #88655
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #88653
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #88652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow passing Int128 to p/invokes by reference #88651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Light up Ascii.Equality.Equals and Ascii.Equality.EqualsIgnoreCase with Vector512 code path #88650
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [Mono] [RISCV] Fix abi issues (Monthly pr) #88649
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [libs][Unix] Fix UTC alias lookup #88641
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [RISC-V] Fix GitHub_* tests #88640
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • Remove stub of special treatment for POSIX char ranges #88590
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix options source gen with non-accessible validation attributes #88613
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Fix virtual static dispatch for variant interfaces when using default implementations #88639
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Ensure that the CpuId tests set preferredVectorByteLength to a non-zero value #88623
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix the formatting of field types FieldInfo.ToString () so it … #88648
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #87993
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot] Add Native AOT cross-build support for iOS-like platforms #88242
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add more docs for new COM source generator types #88627
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #88646
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #88645
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Respect IsDynamicCodeSupported in more places in Linq.Expressions #88539
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Fixes #82871 Add an additional constructor for StackTrace #88542
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Move Win32 resource emission to the compiler #88464
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add support to specify substitutions externally #88230
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.8 #87526
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.19 #87525
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation (#68835) #87143
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.10
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix regex for helix retries when chrome fails to launch #88632
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix hotreload tests #88635
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add some xml comments #88433
    area-Meta

Updated

  • [wasm] Optimize Vector128<float>/<double>.Equals in interp/jiterp #88064
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure GCHeap related debugging still works even when we use newer CLRGC to target older runtimes #88457
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Do not say the wrong default behavior for blittable arrays in ComInterfaceGenerator warning #88212
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [WIP] source-build: don't skip building Native Aot artifacts. #88520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update binding generator to do case-insensitive config-key/property name matching, & make some formatting improvements #88338
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add public MethodInvoker and ConstructorInvoker classes #88415
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation
  • HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Light up core ASCII.Utility methods with Vector256/Vector512 code paths. #88532
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #88548
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Do not use `RhGetCodeTarget` in delegate equality #88611
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • EventPipe support for ProcessInfo #87562
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2219247 #88636
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Move startup validation to the options assembly #88546
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Linker parallel OutputStep #87182
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [Mono] UnsafeAccessorAttribute non-generic support for field #88626
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Enable finalizer events for EventPipe #88604
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Add GC.KeepAlive to COM paths in WeakReference #88537
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • WIP: [Mono] Add dotnet-gcdump support. #88634
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] mono_exit improvements #88387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • wrap exceptions from callbacks in QuicError.CallbackError #88614
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - some refactoring, and rationalizing #88357
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Improve byte array allocations with ArrayPool #88551
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Combine writes in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #88502
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement support for `UnsafeAccessor` in the trimmer #88268
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Added QuicException.TransportErrorCode #88550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Quote whole commands to make it easier to consume linker args by Xamarin #88294
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [Mono] Add coreclr_shutdown to mono #88594
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] A few scalability fixes for the fat Lock #88633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter thread safety infrastructure #88279
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
